name: Spooky Joint Liquidity Provider
description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a pool on [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms). Rewards are harvested, split between the two tokens, sold for more {{token}}, and re-deposited into the strategy.

en.name: Spooky Joint Liquidity Provider
en.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a pool on [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms). Rewards are harvested, split between the two tokens, sold for more {{token}}, and re-deposited into the strategy.

fr.name: Spooky Joint Liquidity Provider
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur le coté d'une pool sur [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms). Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Spooky Joint Liquidity Provider
es.description: Suministra {{token}} como la mitad de un proveedor de liquidez conjunto para un grupo en [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms). Las recompensas se cosechan, se dividen entre los dos tokens, se venden por más {{token}} y se vuelve a depositar en la estrategia.

de.name: Spooky Joint Liquidity Provider
de.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a pool on [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms). Rewards are harvested, split between the two tokens, sold for more {{token}}, and re-deposited into the strategy.

pt.name: Spooky Joint Liquidity Provider
pt.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a pool on [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms). Rewards are harvested, split between the two tokens, sold for more {{token}}, and re-deposited into the strategy.

el.name: Spooky Joint Liquidity Provider
el.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a pool on [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms). Rewards are harvested, split between the two tokens, sold for more {{token}}, and re-deposited into the strategy.

tr.name: Spooky Joint Liquidity Provider
tr.description: [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms) üzerindeki bir havuz için ortak likidite sağlayıcısının yarısı olarak {{token}} sağlar. Ödüller toplanır, iki jeton arasında bölünür, daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır ve stratejiye yeniden yatırılır.

vi.name: Spooky Joint Liquidity Provider
vi.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a pool on [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms). Rewards are harvested, split between the two tokens, sold for more {{token}}, and re-deposited into the strategy.

zh.name: Spooky Joint Liquidity Provider
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 作为流动性的一半放入 [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms) 以赚取收益。收获到的奖励会分配给交易对的两个代币，卖掉，换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。

hi.name: Spooky Joint Liquidity Provider
hi.description: [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms) पर एक पूल के लिए संयुक्त तरलता प्रदाता के आधे हिस्से के रूप में {{token}} की आपूर्ति करता है। पुरस्कारों को वसूल किया जाता है, दो टोकन के बीच विभाजित किया जाता है, अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है, और रणनीति में फिर से जमा किया जाता है।
